definition: aunt by marriage/husband's aunt/husband's father's younger brother's wife
uncle/father's younger brother/husband's younger brother/Taiwan pr. [shu2]

sentences.english: Getting a little grandson this year, my husband's aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
sentences.chinese: 叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。

definition: grandfather's sister/sister of a woman's father-in-law
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
(old) grandfather/polite address for an elderly man, or a woman's father-in-law/(Taiwanese) grandfather
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
